ygData.subject: Re: Bugs Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 827
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks. I ll have to make a note of that. :-) luv, -Su
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks. I'll have to make a note of that. :-)
luv,
-Su

> After the last small patch, I couldn't get past the character select
> screen either. I went into chat and asked the GM for help. He never
> DID reply. But another player told me to right-click on my dial-up
> connection, select properties. Then click on the "Networking" tab,
> highlight "QoS Packet Scheduler" and uninstall it. This seemed to
> work for me.
>
> --- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Su <suceress@d...> wrote:
> > Speaking of bugs...
> > I was at the chat waiting for error 1018 to clear and the GM was
> saying that
> > there is a known issue with dialup not letting people past
> character select.
> > There are people with dialup accounts who haven't been able to
> login for 2
> > months now.
> > I'm interested in hearing about other bug as well. I'm thinking of
> compiling
> > a list.
> > luv,
> > -Su
> >
> > > I've never had to hail the NPC to turn in quest stuff, but I
> usually did
> > to
> > > make sure I had the NPC I was looking for. I'd also say it could
> be a bug,
> > > but we all know there isn't any bugs in EQ.
> > >
> > > Damasciss Kyndhart
>
>
